8L tank intended for one Betta to live in. A little small but suitable as a backup tank.
This 20L tank is divided into two so that two Betta fish can be kept without any danger.
This tank is 32L and similar to the duo tank, only it allows three fish to be safely kept.
This 9L tank is the perfect size for a first-time Betta owner. It's beautiful and functional.
20L might seem like a lot for one Betta, but tanks can never be too big. This one is a perfect example.
